title: Tesla Full Self Driving Not For Sale After February 14
description:
One of our former writers shared the news with us today that Tesla will no longer sell “Full Self Driving” with its cars after Valentine’s Day, February 14. However, it will still be offered as a subscription option. Tesla CEO Elon Musk made the announcement this morning. Why Valentine’s Day? ... [continued]

The post Tesla Full Self Driving Not For Sale After February 14 appeared first on CleanTechnica.
